attributes.action: Ask the Queen to Prevent Prince Charles becoming King and pass the throne on to Prince William
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: John Terry has been stripped of the England captaincy for alledged infidelity as such the precendence has now been set. Given Prince Charles has had similar allegations in the past it would be an outrage and devisive for this man to become our next head of state and the throne should pass on to Prince William. If we are going to have these standards for the England team captain and there are good reasons for that then surely the same standards should apply to our future head of state.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
